AV-8B Harrier.name: AV-8B Harrier
AV-8B Harrier.description: –1 @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Vehicle Notes]{Handling} when in VTOL mode.

Bicycle.name: Bicycle
Bicycle.description: 50% chance a shot hits the rider instead. Doubles rider’s @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Movement]{Pace} and @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Movement]{running die} result.

Carriage.name: Carriage
Carriage.description: Pulled by one @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-equipment.Horse]{Horse}. @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Movement]{Pace} on the tabletop is 12 and it may run.

Dirt Bike.name: Dirt Bike
Dirt Bike.description: Stock bike designed for off-road use with excellent shocks. Off Road (treat as @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Vehicle Notes]{4WD}). 50% chance any uncalled shot hits the character instead.

Galley.name: Galley
Galley.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Vehicle Notes]{Heavy Armor}. Has both oars and sails.

Hover Tank.name: Hover Tank
Hover Tank.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Vehicle Notes]{Heavy Armor}, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Vehicle Notes]{Hover}, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Vehicle Notes]{Night Vision}.

M1A1 Abrams.name: M1A1 Abrams
M1A1 Abrams.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Vehicle Notes]{Heavy Armor}, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Vehicle Notes]{Night Vision}, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Vehicle Notes]{Tracked}.

M2 Bradley.name: M2 Bradley
M2 Bradley.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Vehicle Notes]{Heavy Armor}, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Vehicle Notes]{Night Vision}, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Vehicle Notes]{Tracked}.

Minivan.name: Minivan
Minivan.description: Typical family mini-van. @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Vehicle Notes]{Air bags}, some luxury features.

Semi-Truck.name: Semi-Truck
Semi-Truck.description: Trailer is @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Size and Scale]{Size} 7 (Large), @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Characters]{Toughness} 14 (2). *@Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Vehicle Notes]{Handling} with a trailer attached is –2.

Sports Car.name: Sports Car
Sports Car.description: Mustang or similar stock sports cars.

Street Bike.name: Street Bike
Street Bike.description: Stock name-brand street bikes designed for urban use. 50% chance any uncalled shot hits the character instead.

T-34/76.name: T-34/76
T-34/76.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Vehicle Notes]{Heavy Armor}, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Vehicle Notes]{Sloped Armor} (front only), @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Vehicle Notes]{Tracked}.

T80 MBT.name: T80 MBT
T80 MBT.description: @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Vehicle Notes]{Heavy Armor}, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Vehicle Notes]{Night Vision}, @Compendium[swade-core-rules.swade-rules.Vehicle Notes]{Tracked}.
